title: Death Threats.

embed.description: riotsupport I need some help. I just got a Private Message in my League of Legends client with a serious death threat. This over a simple game of LoL. Please reach out to me ASAP.

body:
Today I experienced the most extreme thing ever, during my time as a League of Legends player. After a match one of my teammates who had been complaining about my gameplay all game added me. As the nice person I am I accepted the friend request and asked "What?" because I didn't know what he/she wanted.

He/she answered "Where are you from?" and I hold him/her that it's not concerning them.

Instead of dropping the conversation he told me "I'm going to track your IP and I'm going to murder you and your family."
Later on he even said he would send his "%%%%%s" to murder me after they raped all my family members. They would murder me afterwards by cutting/pulling off my limbs piece by piece. Very EXTREME threats.

This shocked me as this is the first time I've had an online death threat thrown at me, over a GAME. Even if this is all a "joke" or a way to try and scare people I'm sure that I'm not the only one who's been threatened in this or any similar way. This should be taken way more serious than some people may think, after all it's a **THREAT**, and threatening people is illegal in most countries.

Also since this is League of Legends of course some people will say, "This is league, what do you expect?"
Well I can tell you that there is plenty of polite players out there and that taking threats like this more serious is better for the entire player base.

That would make the community so much better in every way.
I'd rather play with a 0/16 {{champion:102}} {{champion:142}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:16}} or any other champion, than with a 22/3 toxic player.

Playing games is supposed to be fun.
